00016     static const Real fPointError = .001;
00017     static const Real PI = 3.1415926535897932;
00018     static const int Infinity = 2e37;

00020     bool eq(Real a, Real b, Real error = fPointError); // ==

00023     bool ge(Real a, Real b, Real error = fPointError); // >=
00024     bool lt(Real a, Real b, Real error = fPointError); // <
00025     bool gt(Real a, Real b, Real error = fPointError); // >
00026     bool ze(Real a, Real error = fPointError); // is zero

00061     template<typename T1, typename T2>
00062     inline T1 Max(const T1 &a, const T2 &b) { return (a > b) ? a : b; }
00063 
00064     template<typename T1, typename T2>
00065     inline T1 Min(const T1 &a, const T2 &b) { return (a < b) ? a : b; }
00066 
00067     template<typename T>
00068     inline void ClampLower(T bound, T &var) { if (var < bound) { var = bound; } }
00069 
00070     template<typename T>
00071     inline void ClampUpper(T bound, T &var) { if (var > bound) { var = bound; } }
00072 
00073     template<typename T>
00074     inline void Clamp(T lower, T upper, T &var) {
00075         clampLower(lower, var);
00076         clampUpper(upper, var);
00077     }
00078 
00079     template<typename T>
00080     inline void Swap(T &a, T &b) {
00081         T temp = a;
00082         a = b;
00083         b = temp;
00084     }
00085 
00086     template <typename T>
00087     inline void DeletePointer(T &pointer) {
00088         assert(pointer);
00089         delete pointer;
00090         pointer = 0;    
00091     }
00092 
00093     template <typename T>
00094     inline void DeleteArray(T &pointer) {
00095         assert(pointer);
00096         delete[] pointer;
00097         pointer = 0;    
00098     }
00099 };
